title: Alprazolam experience with 2.5mg
report: well.. it was nice experience with such a low dose. there were just a little euphoria and no ego loss at all, next time i'm going to try it with 7.5mg dose.

erowid.citation: Milou. "Alprazolam experience with 2.5mg: experience with Alprazolam (ID 4113)". Erowid.org. Apr 8, 2001. erowid.org/exp/4113
